ai-anya-e1209n:493_0: like the Good Dhamma from one who is good.
ai-anya-e1209n:494_0: who has good friends, and is pleasing to the path,
ai-anya-e1209n:495_0: Who is the awakened one to the Awakened One?
ai-anya-e1209n:497_0: That’s how it is so very hard to find that
ai-anya-e1209n:498_0: Bound by fish’s bidding, desire to welfare,
ai-anya-e1209n:499_0: * he did not possess the faith of virtue, etc., which is connected with the good.
